test.name: SecretMMS.TC.013
test.description:
Validate Sender can enable/disable "Secret MMS" function Test Category: MUST Test Steps: --------------------------------------------------------------- Scenario # 1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Enable the Secret MMS feature for the sender.
Scenario # 1: 1. Login to the MMS Extra Management portal. 2. Disable the Secret MMS feature for the sender. ---------------------------------------------------------------

function.name: executeRemoteXMSCommand
function.parameter: run command querier -y 1 -x 0 -o MMSX -p F.CEE.DB-ACCESS -m com.mobilgw.intf.uds.mor.MmsxService.updateServiceSecret subscriberId=7001 serviceEnabled=false

function.name: executeRemoteXMSCommand
function.parameter: run command querier -y 1 -x 0 -o MMSX -p F.CEE.DB-ACCESS -m com.mobilgw.intf.uds.mor.MmsxService.updateServiceSecret subscriberId=7001 serviceEnabled=true
